name: Richard Anthonio
description: i am rolland single father with two kids, a Capricorn and an Italian native, something of a rarity I am told! My father was originally from Jackson, MS. but I was born and brought up in Rome, Italy. I was somehow bored which made me preffered overseas job as an Engineer in order to help myself overcome my boredom situation, but I’m fully ready to relocate to anywhere in States, wherever I may found a true love, someone I can live the rest of my life with in PEACE, JOY, HAPPINESS and LOVE.
